name: Rumarocket, Inc.
description: Developer of a talent management platform designed to increase the efficiency of the hiring process. The company's platform uses skill-based assessments and big data analytics to improve retention, enabling businesses to identify and engage employees according to their needs.
one_liner: Developer of a talent management platform designed to increase the efficiency of the hiring process. The company's platform uses skill-based assessments and big data analytics to improve retention, enabling businesses to identify and engage employees according to their needs.
